urls.title: Go First's Easy Web Check In for Domestic & International Flights
urls.description: Ensure social distancing with web check-in. Provide the relevant details and get your check-in process done within a few minutes. Learn more now.

urls.title: Food & Beverage (Menu) - Go First
urls.description: Satisfy those cravings in-flight, by simply pre-booking your favourite snacks online or choose from our onboard refreshed menu. You can pick from an array of veg, non-veg, and Jain snacks to please your taste buds. Go First accepts credit/debit card payments on all domestic and international flights for on-board meal purchases. Please note that Diners Club and Amex cards are not accepted. Cash transactions are not applicable on international flights. Go First has added Raj Uphaar’s Raj Amrut rice chakri,

data.text:
Taste & Health go hand-in-hand🤝🏻 in the new GO FIRST in-flight menu!
 
So #SayYEStoInflightCravings, #SayYes to tasty salads & croissants to relish a delectable experience on-board🤩  

Pre-book now - https://t.co/s5SXfPWoxr https://t.co/3SR6gQ0ZXJ

urls.title: Go First - Terms & Conditions.
urls.description: In view of the Covid-19 pandemic, we have laid down some conditions of carriage. You are advised to read them before you travel. Click here to read.
